name: Sanity's Atmosphere
description:
Game Info

Sanity's Atmosphere is a short survival horror game with around 10-20 mins of gameplay. You wake up in a prison not knowing what happened. You have to escape but beware there is someone or something with you. Discover all the endings. Do you have the courage to play this game :)

Controls

WASD
MoveShiftRunCCrouchSpaceJumpFFlashlightE InteractMouse Button 3Zoom

Credits

Programming, Visuals, and Project made by Tudypie

3D Models :

Scary Man by Nicholas Veselov

Prison Low Poly by ArtStudios3D

Audio :

Dark Star by x345

Horror Elements by Anthon

Additional Info

This game was made in a very short time :) Any feedback is appreciated. Don't forget to follow me for other horror indie games. If you enjoyed the game please leave a comment :) Thanks for the support :D

If you want to support me in making more indie horror games you can donate here: Buy Me a Coffee
